flags - Variable in class com.ftdi.j2xx.D2xxManager.FtDeviceInfoListNode

FT_BITMODE_ASYNC_BITBANG - Static variable in class com.ftdi.j2xx.D2xxManager
Bit Mode bits :
Reset: D2xxManager.FT_BITMODE_RESET,
Asynchronous Bit Bang (FT232B, FT2232, FT232H, FT2232H, FT4232H): D2xxManager.FT_BITMODE_ASYNC_BITBANG,
MPSSE (FT2232, FT2232H, FT4232H and FT232H devices only) : D2xxManager.FT_BITMODE_MPSSE,
Synchronous Bit Bang (FT232R, FT245R, FT2232, FT2232H, FT4232H and FT232H devices only) : D2xxManager.FT_BITMODE_SYNC_BITBANG,
MCU Host Bus Emulation Mode (FT2232, FT2232H, and FT232H devices only) : D2xxManager.FT_BITMODE_MCU_HOST,
Fast Opto-Isolated Serial Mode (FT2232, FT2232H, and FT232H devices only) : D2xxManager.FT_BITMODE_FAST_SERIAL,
CBUS Bit Bang Mode (FT232R and FT232H devices only) : D2xxManager.FT_BITMODE_CBUS_BITBANG,
Single Channel Synchronous 245 FIFO Mode (FT2232H and FT232H devices only) : D2xxManager.FT_BITMODE_SYNC_FIFO

FT_DEVICE_2232 - Static variable in class com.ftdi.j2xx.D2xxManager
Device Type :
bvdDevice = 0x0200 or 0x0400 and iSerialNumber != 0: D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_232B,
bvdDevice = 0x0200 and iSerialNumber != 0 : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_8U232AM,
Unknown : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_UNKNOWN,
bvdDevice = 0x0500 : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_2232,
bvdDevice = 0x0600 : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_232R,
bvdDevice = 0x0600 : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_245R,
bvdDevice = 0x0700 : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_2232H,
bvdDevice = 0x0800 : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_4232H,
bvdDevice = 0x0900 : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_232H,
bvdDevice = 0x1000 : D2xxManager.FT_DEVICE_X_SERIES

Removed Event: D2xxManager.FT_EVENT_REMOVED
